Sentencas: Effects of strontium doping on ionic conductivity of Sm2O3-doped ceria (samarium-doped ceria (SDC)) were investigated.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity investigation in samarium and strontium co-doped ceria system

Sentencas: The distribution and average radius of oxygen vacancies by co-doping divalent and trivalent cations were calculated from a hard-sphere model.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity investigation in samarium and strontium co-doped ceria system

Sentencas: Experimental results exhibit that the best conductivity for Ce0.78Sm0.2Sr0.02O1.88 (0.061 S cm(-1)) specimen is twice that of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 (0.0371 S cm(-1)) at 800 degrees C. A decrease of 50 degrees C in the working temperature of SDC was developed by modifying the dopant concentration, average binding energy and ionic radius of the dopant.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity investigation in samarium and strontium co-doped ceria system

Sentencas: The results confirm the Sm3+ and Sr2+ co-doped ceria material as a potential electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity investigation in samarium and strontium co-doped ceria system
